description: I understand that this was an attempt to make a Linux version of a Session app that you can download on your phone, but it just straight up doesn't load. It opens the windows for a split second and then instantly close. Dunno what to even do from here.
I too could not get it to work. There is a quick flash of something when you try to run it but that is it.

Anything that is based on a blockchain is NOT anonymous. The very nature of a blockchain creates a ledger. The blockchain is an compounded encryption based on last information entered.

In short, those that created it, have the master keys to view the ledger. Thus, it's not anonymous.

Although it has yet to implement voice and video at this point has ditched tor in favour of Lokinet so voice will we coming soon followed later by video. Metadata storage and transmission is not an issue with this app.
summary: Would recommend to anyone concerned about privacy

description: Every time I launch the app it takes a minute or two to launch.
You should update it to the latest verison, every since it updated. Yours stopped working. I use yours because the one from https://getsession.org/download doesn't allow you to pin to to taskbar.

Since the Update that was running yesterday now I am able to work with the App and this is great success already. But I have found a new buck: it is not possible to add Moderators. Would it be possible to solve this failure as well. Thank you. Now you will receive 3 from five Stars. If everything is running, I am convinced to give you a much better Ranking.
